item.title: Settling in Korea
item.description: Itâ€™s been about three months since I’ve arrived in Korea. I am so thankful to this country, the nation of my origins. I finally feel that Iâ€™ve settled down now. I have a studio apartment in Seoul, a job as an English instructor and my foreign resident card (finally)! I had first visited this country about two years ago. I came here on my own, barely being able to read the signs on the road.
